It came days before the wedding and its beautiful! I will certainly be ordering again from sweetwaterdecor!. Thank you.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.text: We ship all of our orders from our warehouse + candle production studio in Cranberry Twp., PA 16066

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text:
We ship around the world (excluding the UK)!

The only FREE SHIPPING available in our shop on certain promotions is in the US only (excluding Hawaii and Alaska).

All customers are responsible for their own country's duties / taxes / extra shipping fees.

Matches cannot ship internationally - if you try to order matches and you are outside of the US, they cannot be shipped to you.

settings.title: How can my order ship faster?
settings.text:
Need your order to ship ASAP? Add Rush My Order to your cart and your order will jump to the top of the shipping queue!

Please note Rush My Order cannot be combined with custom order items. Custom items are shipped directly from the printer and we are not able to expedite production.

Many of our products are also available via Amazon Prime.  Visit, www.amazon.com/sweetwaterdecor or search or your favorite SWD items on Amazon!

settings.title: How long will my order take to ship?
settings.text:
Approximate processing time to ship most orders is 3-5 business days.

We ship Monday - Friday only, excluding holidays.

settings.title: I put in the wrong shipping address, how can I change it?
settings.text:
We ask that you review your order before submitting to ensure all information is accurate.  If you enter a wrong shipping address, please contact us as soon as possible so we may change the address before your item ships. 

Due to the volume of orders we process and how fast USPS + FedEx pickup each day, once an order's label is created, we are unable to make any changes to the delivery address.

If your order ships FedEx, call 1-800-GO-FEDEX to change your address. If your order ships USPS, call 1-800-275-8777 to change your delivery address.

We'd recommend purchasing again and letting us know to cancel the shipping label on your already shipped order, then we will be able to refund your order.

settings.title: When should I order for the holidays?
settings.text:
With a rise in online shopping and number of packages in the USPS, UPS, and FedEx systems, we are shipping around the clock to make sure to get SWD to you!

Like any business, we never can guarantee any shipment by Christmas as we rely on USPS + FedEx for final delivery and their systems can experience delays at anytime.

As a small business, we are doing the best we can, working around the clock, to get packages out asap, all while growing our warehouse and production teams to do so.  We thank you for shopping small and can't wait to see what SWD you gift this year!

If you are in a hurry, be sure to find us on amazon here to shop SWD!

settings.title: International: Why can't I order matches?
settings.text: Matches are considered "dangerous goods" and are therefore not allowed through customs. Matches cannot ship internationally/outside of the US.

settings.title: International: I'm not in the US, am I responsible for customs and duty taxes?
settings.text: Each customer is responsible for any fees, duties, or taxes that they may incur when shipping to countries outside of the US.

settings.title: What is your return & exchange policy?
settings.text:
Used items are non-returnable.

Mystery box sales are final.  No returns will be accepted.

Returns for other items are accepted within 14 days of delivery for store credit minus return shipping charges.  

This window is extended to 30 days for purchases made between Black Friday and Christmas to account for holiday gift giving. Returns will not be accepted after 30 days.

All returns are store credit only.

settings.title: My item arrived damaged, what should I do?
settings.text:
Unfortunately, we cannot control what happens to an order once it is picked up by the shipping carrier for delivery.  If you receive a damaged item, please contact us within 7 days of delivery to submit a claim.

Please provide us with your order number and photos of the damaged item(s) and box in which the order was shipped. 

Once all the information and photos are received, we will then issue a replacement order.

settings.title: My item shows as delivered, but I don't see it?
settings.text:
If your order tracks as delivered but is not received, check around your mailbox, front door, back door, or with neighbors / other household members as packages are delivered to others or even brought in without us knowing. USPS may also track a package as delivered 2-3 days before a package actually delivers.

It is possible it shows undeliverable as well - check the tracking provided in your "your order has shipped" email from us or the Shop App.

Once you have done this and you still are missing your package, you must contact the shipping carrier directly to resolve any delivery issues first:

USPS at 1-800-222-1811​ or your local post office

FedEX at 1-800-463-3339​

Please understand that we cannot take responsibility for lost/missing packages that have been successfully delivered to the address provided with your order.

settings.title: How do I ship my order back to you?
settings.text:
If you are unhappy with your purchase, all UNUSED products can be shipped back to us for return within 14 days of delivery.

Feel free to contact us for a return label. Once we receive the order back, we'll refund you in store credit minus return shipping.

settings.title: discounts + free shipping
settings.text: Sign up for our newsletter or text message below for special discounts, flash sales, and more!

settings.title: Free shipping details
settings.text:
Current promotion: Free Shipping on all US orders $49+ (excluding Alaska + Hawaii) for retail and wholesale ($300+).  Free shipping is automatically applied to all retail orders after any applicable discounts.  

Wholesale bulk discount orders do not qualify for free shipping.

settings.title: Discount code details
settings.text:
Retail customers can sign up for text messages and our newsletter to receive certain discounts throughout the year! See sign ups on the bottom of our website here.

Retail: You may only use 1 discount code per order.  Discount codes cannot be used on previous purchases and are only valid on new orders during the timeframe the coupon is valid in. We cannot retroactively apply any coupons to previous orders.

Wholesale: If you are purchasing wholesale, your wholesale discount is the discount automatically applied to your order.  No additional retail discounts may be applied or your wholesale discount will not work. If you try to use a discount code site (honey, rakuten, etc.) it is not valid on wholesale orders and may disable your wholesale discount.

settings.title: ordering
settings.text: Have a large number of clients you're shopping for? Need assistance? We're here to help!

settings.title: How do I add a gift box to my order?
settings.text:
When ordering gifts, you can choose to have us add in crinkle paper/tissue paper to make your gift special:

 https://www.sweetwaterdecor.com/collections/gift-boxes/products/create-your-own-gift-box

settings.title: How do I ship to multiple addresses?
settings.text:
If you are shipping multiple gifts, each shipping address and each gift box must be its own individual order.  Unfortunately, we cannot ship to multiple addresses from the same order.

If you are sending many orders to multiple people, contact us to get an invoiced order and we'll provide you with an excel sheet to list all of the recipients' addresses in for you! You can add in special notes for each person as well!

settings.title: Can I order a custom product?
settings.text:
We no longer design custom products. We hope you can find something you love in the shop!

Pro Tip:

- Custom candle label: Snag up one of our candles and add your own label for a shower, birthday party, and more on the top! Avery round labels work great!

settings.title: PRODUCT QUESTIONS
settings.text: We make all of our candles + reed diffusers in our candle factory in Cranberry, Twp., PA - just north of Pittsburgh!

settings.title: Where are your products made?
settings.text:
All Sweet Water Decor items are designed in the USA by Owner + Designer, Melissa. 

Many of our products are also made right here in the USA!  Sweet Water Decor candles, reed diffusers, and dispensers are made in Cranberry Twp.,PA USA with our plastic pen sets being made in the USA as well. All other Sweet Water Decor items are designed here by Melissa and imported.

settings.title: How are your designs applied to your mugs and other products?
settings.text: All of our designs and hand lettering are professionally printed onto each product. We do not use vinyl lettering. They won't come off with normal / correct care. Please see each listing for dishwasher / microwave details!

settings.title: How do I care for my coffee + travel mugs?
settings.text: Travel mugs, metal coffee mugs, and metal wine tumblers are hand wash only.  Stoneware mugs, gold handle mugs, and ceramic campfire mugs are dishwasher safe, but to keep all Sweet Water Decor mugs looking their best, we recommend hand washing with a non-abrasive cloth to keep lettering from fading.

settings.title: Can my mug go in the microwave?
settings.text:
Sweet Water Decor travel mugs, metal coffee mugs, and metal wine tumblers are NOT microwave safe. Do not use these products in the microwave. 

Sweet Water Decor stoneware mugs, gold handle mugs, and ceramic campfire mugs are microwave safe meaning these mugs can be used in the microwave without causing damage to the mug or to the microwave. Check out each product's listing for proper care and use.

We do recommend hand washing our gold handle mugs to help preserve the microwave safe finish. If sparks occur or handle becomes too hot, discontinue use in microwave.

Microwave safe does not mean these mugs will not get hot in the microwave.  These mugs will get hot. To avoid burns always use caution removing mugs from the microwave.

settings.title: Your gold handle coffee mugs say "fine bone china" - are they real bone?
settings.text: They are not real bone and are not made with any animal products.  They are Vegan approved, Fine Bone Luxury China.

settings.title: Is it safe to use essential oils or fragrance oils in your plastic dispensers?
settings.text: Yes! Our plastic containers can  safely store products that contain essential oils less than 5% or fragrance oils less than 15%. If your oil percentages exceed these respective levels, please consider using our glass dispensers.

settings.title: Are your plastic dispensers BPA free?
settings.text: Yes! Our plastic dispensers are BPA free and FDA compliant.

settings.title: What refills do you recommend for my SWD pens?
settings.text:
Plastic pen refills: refills: https://amzn.to/3yE0am5

Metal pen refills: caps: https://amzn.to/3wx6IBi

settings.title: Candle Care + INFO
settings.text: Taking good care of your candles is the first step to a better burn, better scent, and happy candle.

settings.title: Will candles melt when shipped in hot weather or too hot climates?
settings.text: Candles can melt when on hot shipping trucks and if your order is left outside in hot temperatures.  Shipping companies will not reimburse for melted candles so we cannot be held liable for melted candles.  Please order at your own risk or choose expedited delivery services.

settings.title: How do I prevent a high flame?
settings.text:
Each time before you light your candle, trim your wick to 1/4" and burn your candle no longer than 4 hours at a time. 

If you are experiencing a high flame, your wick is too long. This can occur even if you've been burning your candle for a long time during a single use.  Extinguish the candle with a candle snuffer or wick dipper, and trim your wick for the next burning. 

Enjoy your candle until around 1/2" of wax remains at the bottom of the jar. Do not burn your candle with less than a 1/2" of wax remaining.

You can check out our candle wick trimmers, dippers, and snuffers here: https://www.sweetwaterdecor.com/collections/candle-care-kits

settings.title: Where and how long should I burn my candle?
settings.text:
Place your candle on a heat safe surface away from any drafts. Keep out of reach of children + pets. Our candles are great for bathrooms, bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms, and more. Every setting and area is different. If you have a room with high ceilings you may want to burn two candles at once to create the atmosphere you desire. A single candle in a smaller room or bathroom works great.

Keep your wick trimmed to 1/4" at all times and make sure you burn your candle until the wax pool reaches the side of the jar. Enjoy your candle burning for up to 4 hours then it's best to extinguish. Be sure to never leave a candle unattended. Enjoy your candle until around 1/2" of wax remains at the bottom of the jar. Do not burn your candle with less than a 1/2" of wax remaining.

settings.title: How long will my candle last, how many hours will it burn? How long will my candle last, how many hours will it burn?
settings.text: Our clear + amber jar candles burn for 40+ hours and our larger candles like our white and mug candles burn for 50+ hours.

settings.title: How long should the wick be before lighting?
settings.text:
Trim your wick to 1/4" using one of our wick trimmers from our candle care kit or scissors / nail clippers work great too!

Keeping your wick trimmed to approximately 1/4" will prevent your candle from smoking or throwing sparks while burning.

settings.title: My candle won't light - what should I do?
settings.text: If your candle won't light the wick either has too much wax on it or was cut too short. Dig out some wax around the wick and re-light.

settings.title: How should I extinguish my candle?
settings.text:
Using one of our wick dippers to gently dip the wick into the wax and pull the wick back out is the recommended way to extinguish your candle to avoid smoke.

Blowing out your candle or using one of our candle snuffers to extinguish your candle will also work.Using one of our wick dippers to gently dip the wick into the wax and pull the wick back out is the recommended way to extinguish your candle to avoid smoke.

Blowing out your candle or using one of our candle snuffers to extinguish your candle will also work.

settings.title: What kind of wax do you use?
settings.text: Our wax is a USA made, proprietary soy wax blend. It is made with US grown soy, kosher, and has a great scent throw! Our wax is beeswax free and coconut wax free.

settings.title: What are your candle wicks made out of?
settings.text: Our wicks are made of cotton and are metal free!

settings.title: What kind of fragrance oils do you use?
settings.text:
We use a combination of essential oils and premium fragrance oils. All of our fragrances are 100% non-toxic when used for their intended purposes, in candles. 

Be sure to check out each candle listing to see which scents and essential oils are used.

settings.title: How strong are your candle scents?
settings.text: We use the highest scent to wax ration possible to ensure a full fragrance.  We do not use toxic chemical boosters found in many commercial candle brands so our candles do not have overpowering scents.  We recommend using multiple candles if using in a larger space or a room with high ceilings.

settings.title: WHOLESALE
settings.text: We sell wholesale around the US and around the world! Visit our wholesale portal here!

settings.title: How do I apply for a wholesale account?
settings.text:
Please visit our Wholesale Guidelines page for more information on our wholesale policies.  

When you are ready to apply for a wholesale account you may do so on our Wholesale Sign Up page. When you create your account, you must also fill out and submit the form on the bottom of the sign up page.  Once we have this form on file we can then either approve or decline your application. 

The approval process can take up to 2 business days. 

You may also shop Sweet Water Decor wholesale on

Handshake

or

Faire.com

settings.title: I can't see wholesale pricing?
settings.text: Be sure to sign in to your account so that wholesale pricing is activated for you!

settings.title: About Us
settings.subheading: From humble beginnings that led us to where we are today.

settings.title: about us
settings.subheading: From humble beginnings that led us to where we are today.

settings.subtitle: How It Started
settings.title: This Is Our Story
settings.text:
Sweet Water Decor is a motivational + inspirational brand founded by Melissa Horvath in 2014.

Along with our amazing and continuously growing team, Melissa still designs each product and now works alongside her husband, Chris, who manages the warehouse and production side of the brand.

From our humble beginnings of Melissa hand making every coffee mug in her basement to now serving hundreds of thousands of customers + having our products in over 7,000 boutiques / shops around the nation, as well as worldwide, our goal continues to be to motivate and inspire our customers.

settings.title: HAND LETTERED DESIGNS
settings.subheading: A lot of the products that you will find in our shop are still hand lettered today by Melissa herself.

settings.subtitle: Our Goal
settings.title: Bringing Light into Your Life and Home
settings.text: Our goal at SWD has always been to motivate and inspire you through our products. Bringing that light into both your life and into your home is our number one priority. We want you to style your home with decor that makes you feel good. Cozy up on a chilly day with a turkish blanket, sip your morning coffee out of a motivational mug, be comforted by the fragrance of one of our most-loved soy candles and elevate your space with decor that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

settings.subtitle: Our VISON
settings.title: top quality items
settings.text: At Sweet Water Decor, we strive to provide our customers with only the best quality products. Each design is thoroughly tested by our team before made available to our customers.

settings.title: candles
settings.text:
In 2017, Melissa had a calling to create a gluten, lead, and phthalate free, high quality fragrance candle line.

Today, it is one of our customer's most-loved products and each of our 100% US grown soy wax blend candles are made by our candle team in Pittsburgh, PA.

We currently offer 37+ top-selling scents available in 6 jar styles as well as in reed diffusers and are constantly creating and testing new scents for our customers.

settings.subtitle: where we've been
settings.title: featured
settings.text:
In 2018, we were honored to be named one of "Amazon’s Women Owned Businesses

to Watch.” Melissa also licenses her work + you may have spied some exclusive SWD designs in your favorite shops - Target, Hobby Lobby, Staples, Marshalls, HomeGoods, TJMaxx, HomeSense, Casetify, + more!

Sweet Water Decor has been proudly featured: Good Morning America, The TODAY Show, NY NOW - Community Impact Award , Brit + Co, Refinery29, Marie Claire, Business Insider, Country Living Magazine, Amazon.com, KDKA Your Pittsburgh, Chris Loves Julia, The Huffington Post, Pop Sugar, + many more!

settings.subtitle: 90 DAY DEVOTIONAL
settings.title: YOU GOT THIS
settings.text:
As women, we are busy. Keeping up with kids, work, school and everything in between. With all of life's obligations, we can lose sight of knowing that we are living out our God given purpose. We need encouragement to remind us that God is working in and through all things, cheering each of us on and that's where I come in.

A little while back, God put it on my heart to write a book on purpose. I have lovingly written 90 devotions to help equip, inspire and empower you to face each day with grace and courage.

Thanks so much for taking the time to learn more about us! Pour yourself a cup of coffee + look around. Our growing team of 30+ work hard behind the scenes designing, fulfilling your orders, + making candles each day.

Cheers!

settings.heading: HOLIDAY SHIPPING TIMES
settings.textarea:
We cannot guarantee delivery by a specific date due to unpredictable delivery times from our Shipping Carriers (Fedex, USPS).
Like many retailers, we are experiencing an influx in orders. Our amazing shipping team is working around the clock to get your orders out as fast as possible. Shipping times will only continue to increase as we get closer to the holidays. 

Approximate SWD Shipping Times: 1-3 business days

We thank you for shopping small this holiday season + can't wait to see how you gift SWD!
